title: My Top 10 Growth Stocks to Buy in 2024
text: Fool.com contributor Parkev Tatevosian has hand-selected 10 growth stocks he thinks will do well in 2024 and beyond. *Stock prices used were the afternoon prices of Dec. 29, 2023. The video was published on Dec. 31, 2023.  Should you invest $1,000 in PayPal right now? Before you buy stock in PayPal, consider this: The Motley Fool Stock Advisor analyst team just identified what they believe are the 10 best stocks for investors to buy now... and PayPal wasn't one of them. The 10 stocks that made the cut could produce monster returns in the coming years.
